overview:
Conor has been involved with e-commerce and business enabling technology since the mid 1990s. His in-depth knowledge of software and networking technologies comes from designing and implementing emerging technologies while working with startup companies, contracting with the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA), North-East Regional Research Center (NRRC) and various branches of the military and intelligence community.

He has consulted with contracting and product based business in the defense sector to bolster sales via acquisition and development of new product strategy. He also has served as a Network Security Engineer with BBN Technologies, an organization that architected the Internet and first e-mail technologies. Prior to joining BBN, Conor held positions at internet startups designing business and web-enabling software.

Conor graduated from the University of Virginia with a B.S. after completing the requirements for both Electrical and Computer Engineering. He received his MBA from the Darden School of Business.
